abstract: A British charity organization that promotes the study and life of Shakespeare, is protesting the release of "Anonymous," a movie by Roland Emmerich that questions the authorship of his works, by covering over Shakespeare's name on several signs.
snippet: A British charity organization that promotes the study and life of Shakespeare, is protesting the release of "Anonymous," a movie by Roland Emmerich that questions the authorship of his works, by covering over Shakespeare's name on several signs.

headline.main: Shakespeare Trust Hides Playwright's Name to Protest 'Anonymous'
headline.print_headline: Covering Up Shakespeare’s Name to Protest a Film
